trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sonoma
There was one other sighting in Sonoma on or around February 6th 2011
divs: sighting detailsout side star gazing-looking @ nothing in particular, when a faint star in my range of vision all of a sudden grew very bright & increased dramatically in size. it was almost like a "pop" of light. after the pop of light vanished w\ in 4-5 seconds the star was no longer visible. i thought perhaps a satellite may have exploded, but read another report that is strikingly similar to my sighting on the same night...so felt compeled to report it. this was seen from the town of sonoma ca looking to the south west @ aprox 7:15 pm
